source.name: Time Clocks for Employee Time Tracking
source.description: Manual time clocks provide enough space to employees that they can easily steal time from their working hours. Automated time clocks enable businesses to monitor their employee’s time and attendance data efficiently and securely. http://ezinearticles.com/?Ditch-Manual-Time-Clocks-and-Stop-Employee-Time-Theft&id=7395298
